title: Fairly heavy rainfall expected in parts of the island
byline: The Department of Meteorology states that showers or thundershowers will occur in several areas across most parts of the island during the afternoon or night.

title: President calls for unity and goodwill in Sinhala and Tamil New Year message
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake, in his Sinhala and Tamil New Year message, calls upon all Sri Lankans to come together with renewed strength, unity, and goodwill to support the nation’s journey toward transformation.

title: “2025 New Year marks a significant turning point” - PM Harini
byline: Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya, in her Sinhala and Tamil New Year message, called on all Sri Lankans to step into the New Year with renewed hope and vision, as the nation moves forward together toward “a prosperous country and a beautiful life.”

title: Opposition Leader calls for unity and resilience to face challenges together in New Year
byline: Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa, in his Sinhala and Tamil New Year message, extended heartfelt wishes to all Sri Lankans and urged the nation to rise above divisions and step into the New Year with unity, resilience, and renewed spirit.

title: Daniel Noboa is reelected Ecuador’s president by voters weary of crime
byline: Ecuadorian voters weary of crime reelected President Daniel Noboa, a conservative young millionaire with a divisive no-holds-barred crimefighting record, by a wide margin Sunday, but his opponent vowed to seek a recount over what she described as “grotesque” electoral fraud.

title: Earthquake of magnitude 6.3 jolts south of Fiji Islands
byline: An earthquake of magnitude 6.3 on the Richter Scale struck South of the Fiji Islands on Monday, a statement by India’s National Center for Seismology (NCS) said.

title: Embrace the New Year with optimism despite adversities: Asgiri Chief Prelate
byline: The dawn of a New Year brings new hope for the people, and therefore, the public should embrace the Sinhala and Tamil New Year with optimism despite adversities, the Chief Prelate of Asgiriya Chapter, Most Venerable Warakagoda Sri Gnanarathana Mahanayake Thero said.

title: Road accidents lead to five deaths including a toddler
byline: A total of five fatalities, including the death of a toddler, has been reported due to separate road accidents in various parts of the island.

title: Katy Perry to fly into space with Blue Origin’s all-women crew today
byline: Pop star Katy Perry will be the biggest name in an all-female group set to touch the edge of space Monday, roaring into the cosmos on one of billionaire Jeff Bezos’ rockets.

title: LG election candidate, 6 party supporters arrested over police complaints
byline: An individual contesting the 2025 Local Government (LG) Election and six political party supporters have been arrested for allegedly violating election laws, Police said.

title: RDA revenue from expressway tolls up by 30%
byline: The revenue generated by the Road Development Authority (RDA) through expressway tolls on 11, 12 and 13 April has increased by 30% in comparison to the income generated during the same period last year.

title: Parents urged to pay more attention to children to minimise accidents
byline: Health authorities have urged parents and elders to pay extra attention to children to minimise accidents during the Sinhala and Tamil New Year festive season.

title: Tariffs on imported semiconductor chips coming soon, Trump says
byline: U.S. President Donald Trump has said he would be announcing the tariff rate on imported semiconductors over the next week, adding that there would be flexibility with some companies in the sector.

title: Three returning from Bangkok arrested with Rs. 45mn worth narcotics
byline: Three Sri Lankans who arrived from Bangkok have been apprehended for the possession of narcotics worth Rs. 45 million this morning (14).

title: Sony hikes PlayStation 5 price by 11% in Europe, Australia and NZ
byline: Sony said it will hike the price of its PlayStation 5 (PS5) console in markets in Europe, Britain, Australia and New Zealand, citing high inflation and fluctuating exchange rates.

title: One dead, 20 injured after multi-vehicle crash in Agbopura
byline: An individual has died while 20 others, including children, have sustained injuries in a collision involving three vehicles in Agbopura this morning (14), Police said.

title: Sri Lanka’s tourism earnings surpass USD 1.1 billion in Q1 2025
byline: The tourism industry generated USD 354 million in March, which has increased Sri Lanka’s earnings from tourism in the first quarter of 2025 to USD 1,122.3 million, according to the latest data from the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL).

title: ‘The Golconda Blue’: Iconic Indian royal diamond to be auctioned for first time
byline: A rare piece of India’s royal heritage, ‘The Golconda Blue’ -- a historic diamond once owned by the Maharajas of Indore and Baroda -- is set to make its auction debut at the Christie’s “Magnificent Jewels” sale in Geneva on May 14.

title: Prime Minister celebrates New Year honouring national traditions
byline: The national ceremony to celebrate the Sinhala and Tamil New Year was held earlier today at Pahala Bomiriya in Kaduwela, with the participation of Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya.

title: Katy Perry roars into space on all-woman flight
byline: Pop star Katy Perry completed a brief foray into space Monday, roaring to the edge of the cosmos with an all-women crew on one of billionaire Jeff Bezos’s rockets.

title: Heat warning issued for several areas
byline: A warm weather advisory has been issued for residents of the Northern, North-Central, North-Western, Western, Southern, and Eastern provinces, as well as the Ratnapura and Monaragala districts.

title: Zelensky urges Trump to visit Ukraine before deal with Russia
byline: Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelensky has invited Donald Trump to visit his country before any deal is struck with Russia to end the war.
